= Soar Tutorial =

=== What You'll Need ===
To go through the Soar Tutorial, you will need to download three things:
  # [Downloads The SoarSuite]: This contains the Soar kernel, the Java debugger, the Soar Tutorial, the Soar Manual and agents that don't require an environment.
  # [Domains_Eaters Eaters]: A pac-man like game and related agents.  This is used in chapter 2 of the tutorial.
  # [Domains_TankSoar TankSoar]: A tank battle game and related agents.  This is used in chapter 3 of the tutorial.

=== Online Version ===
Within the !SoarSuite download, you will find a complete copy of the Soar Tutorial.  They are also provided here for easier online access.
